Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| PC 70 BM |
| P3HT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Note that "PSCs" (Polymer Solar Cells) is not a material property, but rather a type of solar cell, so it has been excluded from the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.71% |
| 4-5% |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* PCE (Personal Computer Expertise)
* PSCs (Photovoltaic Solar Cells)
* PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) (a combination of acronyms representing a specific system)
* PC 70 BM (a specific type of photovoltaic solar cell)
* P3HT (a specific type of organic photovoltaic material)
* PCBM (a specific type of organic photovoltaic material)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Value of material property", presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.71% |
| 4-5% |

The entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Value of material property" are:

* 2.71% (the value of the highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) system)
* 4-5% (the value of the P3HT : PCBM devices)
